name: VRetired
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
